content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/"                        xmlns:moz="http://www.mozilla.org/2006/browser/search/">   <ShortName>CTAN search</ShortName>   <Description>Search on CTAN for TeX-related material</Description>   <InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding>   <Image width="16" height="16" type="image/x-icon">http://www.ctan.org/images/favicon.ico</Image>   <Url type="text/html" method="get" template="http://www.ctan.org/search">     <Param name="phrase" value="{searchTerms}"/>   </Url>   <moz:SearchForm>http://www.ctan.org/search</moz:SearchForm> </OpenSearchDescription>
